attributes.additional_details:
The atrocious replacement papers that were distributed by Edexcel, after allegedly the original papers were leaked in Egypt. However, many of the papers included questions that were far more difficult than those experienced in previous years. Including questions in the C3 exam (6665) that were not detailed in the specification.

Either a resit should be provided with a fairer paper, or dramatically reduce the grade boundaries for the exam! University places depend on it!

rejection.details: You should discuss any concerns you have over this exam with the school – who can advise you about what happens next. You are also free to contact the Edexcel exam board directly, if you wish, to discuss your concerns further.
